lender.name: Shari
lender.loan_because: I Love the idea of helping people be successful and self sufficient.

lender.occupational_info: I work for a group that buys and improves distressed companies.

lender.name: Kimberlee
lender.loan_because: It is so easy to make a big difference for people how could I not?

lender.name: Amber
lender.loan_because: I can and I truly enjoy helping others.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I think it's the best way to turn our world around.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student at a University in New York State. I am currently studying Biochemistry, and hope one day to attend medical school

lender.name: Sandy & Don
lender.loan_because: Being able to be a small part of a large global effort to help those who seek assistance is something everyone should think about.

lender.name: saul alexander
lender.loan_because: nescesito un prestamo de aproximadamente $1800 , para comprar un automovil, para trabajar como taxista, es mi ocupacion actual pero, cancelo a diario por el alquiler del auto, me gustaria poder tener mi propio auto para mejorar mi estilo de vida y el de mi familia, soy padre de 6 hijos tres de los cuales aun tengo que mantener, de antemano gracias...
lender.occupational_info: trabajo como taxista en la ciudad de santa ana, el salvador, he sido motorista desde hace 25 años, he trabajado anteriormente en empresas de transporte urbano en mi ciudad.

lender.name: AEB in NC
lender.loan_because: Corporate banking has brought the world economy to it's knees. Maybe micro lending can bring it back to it's feet.

lender.name: Jack
lender.loan_because: I like to.
lender.occupational_info: I make audio for video games.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: I want my money to do more than just sit in the bank.
lender.occupational_info: Student

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I should help others, I'm not the most religious person, but helping others is very basic .
lender.occupational_info: I am envolved in planning how to make and build aircraft components.

lender.name: Raman
lender.loan_because: No better way to help people in need than to lend them the money -- by the people, for the people. With a loan I am assured to some degree that the money would be used directly and efficiently by someone in need. Further, a loan instills a sense of self-respect in the borrower compared to charity. Hopefully some day, when they are in a position to aid someone in need, that will be a direct measure of success. Programs like this have the capacity to make the world a better place for future generations.
lender.occupational_info: I conduct economic and financial analysis.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: I've been lucky to have access to money when I needed it, so I should pass that on.

lender.name: Colleen
lender.loan_because: Everyone should be given the tools to make their dreams come true and make a living on their own terms.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a history teacher

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: I believe microfinance is our greatest weapon to fight poverty.

lender.name: William
lender.occupation: Director of two conversational language schools

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: Doing so seems to follow the Golden Rule. When I was young, I knew how tough it was to be in business without any money to start up.
lender.occupational_info: My trade is building cabinets and furniture, mostly kitchen cabinets. My shop is small and I am self-employed. My daily travel is 10 km each way to my shop, and I use my bicycle - summer and winter.

lender.name: Joe
lender.loan_because: I am lucky enough to be in a position to help others and appreciate how giving someone the ability to earn a living can help elevate their lives, as well as their family and community.
lender.occupational_info: I import and redistribute globally sourced, private label items for a Fortune 500 company.

lender.name: Justin
lender.loan_because: I care about Africa

lender.name: becky
lender.loan_because: i believe we should all help each other.
lender.occupational_info: i paint things for television shows and movies, i also painted homes for 10 years.

lender.name: Lindsay
lender.loan_because: It benefits everyone to help others succeed in life

lender.name: carrie
lender.loan_because: it's important to give back however I can. I would love to be a part of someone else's success.

lender.name: Steven
lender.loan_because: Im not rich but i beleive everyone needs a chance.
lender.occupational_info: im a medic

lender.name: Renny
lender.loan_because: I have been blessed with opportunities in my life, and I want to provide opportunities to those in need so that they can also be successful.
lender.occupational_info: I manage a team of people who make computers work.

lender.name: Ray Wizard
lender.loan_because: I am blessed with a wonderful life that allows me to share my abundance with others. We are all one family and what affects one of us affects all of us.
lender.occupational_info: business consulting and internet marketing

lender.name: Daniel
lender.loan_because: I care
lender.occupational_info: I write software

lender.name: Jim Howard
lender.loan_because: I think microlending is a great idea. I never did think I could do something like that since I do not have much money. I love the idea of helping someone and it makes me feel very good.
lender.occupational_info: I am retired. I worked as a hospital security officer for 30 years. Before that I was a welder.

lender.name: William
lender.loan_because: I want to help farmers in developing countries, I identify with farmers because my grandparents were all farmers and I like to garden myself.
lender.occupational_info: I identify and map plants focusing on both rare plants and weeds, I pull or spray weeds, collect seeds, and plant seedlings in an effort to insure that no important kinds of plants will die out. Also my family has a wheat farm.

lender.name: Indigo
lender.loan_because: I love helping people succeed. I started my own business using my own capital, but that is not possible for many people, particularly in other parts of the world. I am happy to lend a helping hand to get someone started or help them reach the next level.
lender.occupational_info: I help businesses and non-profit organizations (NGOs) use online technology and business process "best practices" to become more successful in providing their products/services to new and existing customers.

lender.name: Rachel
lender.loan_because: I think it is the best way to help people all over the world reach their highest potential and support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I am lucky enough to pursue my dreams as an actor and musician, supporting myself by doing lots of different jobs to pay my mortgage.

lender.name: Carey
lender.loan_because: I believe that everyone that wants to have a chance to create their own livelihood should have the opportunity. I lived in East Africa for two and a half years and understand what true poverty is and how little is required to really make a difference for the better in someone's life. I love people and honestly want the best for all. I hope anything I do to help might make someone's life better and happier.
lender.occupational_info: I sell hardware.

lender.name: David
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Lawyer- trials and asset protection.

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: I want to help others to have the chance to improve their lives and their financial security. It is a small part of commitment to the global community.
lender.occupational_info: I work on designing aircraft electric systems. The company that I work for builds electric power generators and other parts for airplanes.

lender.name: Hanna
lender.loan_because: my father (God rest his sould) was a good teacher.

lender.name: Jamie
lender.loan_because: Why not?

lender.occupational_info: I work at a not for profit agency and I provide support and encouragement to people who are 55 or older who are either homeless or at risk of becoming homeless. lender.name: Saras Vision (An AMC)
lender.loan_because: Sohail Khan Founder Chairman & Managing Director International Certified Financial Consultants Saras Vision (An Asset Management Company) Mumbai India Website: www.sarasvision.com
lender.occupational_info:
International Certified Financial Consultants
We specialize in the below mentioned products; a) Over Draft Facility in INR Currency b) Cash Credit Facility in INR Currency c) Bills Discounting Facility in INR Currency d) Bank Guarantees Facility in INR / Foreign Currency e) Term Loan in INR / Foreign Currency f) Packing Credit Facility (pre-shipment) in INR / Foreign Currency g) Packing Credit Facility (post-shipment) in Foreign Currency h) PCFC in Foreign Currency (LIBOR) i) Factoring - Domestic & Export in INR / Foreign Currency j) Hedging Services for Foreign Currency k) Forward Cover for Foreign Currency l) Letter of Credit (Inland) in INR Currency m) Letter of Credit (Import / Overseas) in Foreign Currency o) Equity Funding in INR / Foreign Currency p) Unsecured EMI Based SME Term Loan in INR Currency (max. INR 500 Lakhs) q) Purchase Invoice Finance in INR Currency r) Project Finance in INR / Foreign Currency s) Bills of Exchange / Private Hundi Finance in INR Currency (Offer limited to Clients situated in Mumbai, India only) t) Working Capital Limit in INR Currency u) Line of Credit facility in Foreign Currency v) Loans against Stocks/Shares in Foreign Currency

lender.loan_because: i want to start my own work place by using my knowledge about computers and mobile accessories to build up my future and count on my own self to have kinda normal life like it supose to be for everynoe and i mean not that big famous life but it just a way that it could hopefully make my life looks fine and doing well
lender.occupational_info: well it depends on the choosing activity that i will get start on it and i think it's a describe that i feel im able to say and its a choose and a conversation to take it with that person whos intersting about my story

lender.loan_because: it's an opportunity to help others
lender.occupational_info: educator

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because: I heard about this from a friend last year but unfortunately didn't remember to sign up. I strongly believe in helping people help themselves, and I think Kiva is a great way for me to use a small amount of my own money in a positive way.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a high school student who wants to go to college and study mathematics and women's studies. I'm very interested in working to increase women's political and economic autonomy around the world.

lender.name: Jon
lender.loan_because: It is safer than keeping my money in US banks.
lender.occupational_info:
My job requires me to work on medical research using mathematics and computers.
On occasion, I relax by feeding seagulls dried dog food. The town I live in is by the ocean and I live on a little island renting a condo.
Beer is always good, too.

lender.name: Denise
lender.loan_because: there are people out there who are in more need than I

lender.name: Katherine
lender.loan_because:
We live in a very big world but it is easy to get lost in our tiny personal sphere. Kiva helps me to step out of my day to day struggles and frustrations. Loaning on Kiva helps me to put my world in context and to remind myself how incredibly blessed I am. I loan because it is the very least I can do to express my gratitude for the gifts my life has given to me.
By stepping outside my town, state, or country's needs on Kiva I feel that I can impact a world that is often hidden from my sight. It reminds me of the importance of helping strangers and spreading the blessings I have been given to those that are in greater need than I will ever experience.
I loan to be an agent of change in a country that politically and socially has tied many of it's citizens hands.
I loan because it fills my heart with love and joy in a disjointed world.
I loan to women specifically because, as a strong woman, I feel that it is my duty to support the empowerment and safety of other strong women that are risking life and limb every day just to care for their families. I do not discriminate against men in life or on Kiva but I have made a choice to loan only to women due to that desire.
lender.occupational_info: I study Behavioral Ecology and Environmental Economics through Prescott College. The goal of my studies is to bring more sustainable results into the world of endangered species population restoration that I find so fascinating.

lender.name: Lee
lender.loan_because: I wouldn't do anything better with it and my mom would have.
lender.occupational_info: Helping students and teachers use computers to communicate and learn.

lender.name: Chris feaster
lender.loan_because: because i see food aid as somewhat counter productive. since it depresses food prices and hurts poor farmers.
lender.occupational_info: I work on the railroad signals and crossing. i keep trains safe. i keep trains from crashing into trains and cars from running in front of trains.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: $25.00 today can impact millions tomorrow.

lender.name: Nathan
lender.occupational_info: I am in graduate school studying Audiology. Audiology is the study of hearing and balance disorders. Audiologists diagnose hearing loss and balance disorders and utilize hearing aids and other rehabilitative techniques to enhance communication.

lender.name: Randall
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do, to help others when possible. Being of service to a deserving family or a struggling single mother makes my day.
lender.occupational_info: I help people get out of trouble with tax authorities or creditors.

lender.name: Allegra
lender.loan_because: I like the fact that I can donate small amounts of money at a time: as a student, this is very useful.

lender.name: Leonidas
lender.loan_because: why not?

lender.name: linda
lender.loan_because: i would probably just waste it on cigarettes and sodas
lender.occupational_info: i make stuff.

lender.name: Griffin
lender.loan_because: It's a good thing to do!

lender.name: Tara
lender.loan_because: I care :)

lender.name: Misha
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I have had people make a difference in my life, and asked nothing in return. I see this as my opportunity to do the same for others.
lender.occupational_info: For 31 years I was a firefighter in California. I have fought fire in the city, the forests, and the wildland. I have helped people injured in accidents, and helped educate children about fire safety. I retired in the year 2000.

lender.name: Darius
lender.loan_because: I don't have much but some people have less.Life can be so beautiful if we only open our heart's to people in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work with very special people and I love what I do.

lender.name: Andrew
lender.loan_because: I love that each dollar I loan will impact many people down the road.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Brad
lender.loan_because: We all benefit when we support each other.

lender.name: Tom
lender.loan_because: KIVA is a way to make the world a better place to be, for all of us.
lender.occupational_info: I am an information systems analyst for a hospital corporation.

lender.name: Ross
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Joseph
lender.loan_because: I am able to help other small business owners like myself all over the world. It's great to know that I can make an impact, for the better, on the lives of others.
lender.occupational_info: I build, repair, and, restore buildings for residential and commercial owners and property managers.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: capitalism is the best path to prosperity.

lender.name: Sarah
lender.loan_because: We're all in this together.

lender.name: yooji
lender.loan_because:
I would like to make a difference no matter how small. Better to do a little than nothing at all.
I believe that micro credit financing helps alleviate poverty, and makes differences.
lender.occupational_info: I currently study economics, politics, and languages. I hope to make a positive change in the world some day.

lender.name: Brent
lender.loan_because: microfinance works!
lender.occupational_info: I tell stories.

lender.name: Eric
lender.loan_because: I'm too busy to volunteer my time but want to help others in a direct way. I also think the more interconnected people in the world become, the closer we'll get to a world at peace.

lender.name: Scout
lender.loan_because: Growing up my family was quite poor, but through my mom's hard work and careful money management, I was able to get a great education. I want all hard-working people to have the financial opportunities to improve the lives of their families, too.
lender.occupational_info: I am a graduate student studying for my Ph.D. I research how to make computers more secure while still keeping them easy-to-use. I hope someday to be a professor of computer science at a university.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Helping Hustlers Hustle is my game.

lender.name: FinnKat-JamBry
lender.loan_because: I live here

lender.name: TJ Hu
lender.loan_because: I feel like it's the right thing to do.... and why not lend?
lender.occupational_info: I am a student of Economics and Physics at Duke University.

lender.name: Paul
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people around the world!
lender.occupational_info: I manage in-store technology for a US retail compnay.

lender.name: MARTIN
lender.loan_because: it, good to help people help themselves, and it's not that much money to help change someones life

lender.name: Glenn
lender.loan_because: It feels wonderful, and my kids learn that giving is precious

lender.name: Monique
lender.loan_because: This seems like a wonderful, sustainable way to make a small start on righting economic inequality.
lender.occupational_info: I'm working towards my PhD in philosophy.

lender.name: Myron
lender.loan_because: There's always someone out there that needs the 25 bucks more than I do.

lender.name: OregonEconStudents
lender.loan_because: We loan to learn economics, benefits of MFIs, and to develop world community ideals.
lender.occupational_info: Instructor and economics students.

lender.name: James
lender.loan_because: Micro-finance is a true and honest way to help people as opposed to temporary solutions.
lender.occupational_info: I am looking for a job right now but in the long run I am studying to become an accountant.

lender.name: Domenica A Gonzales
lender.loan_because: Creo que los prestamos son importantes para realizar cambios duraderos. Solidaridad es necesaria para el desarrollo de la comunidad.
lender.occupational_info: I work with high-risk families, and I love it!

lender.name: Kim
lender.loan_because: I want to extend a helping hand to those who are in need.
